Title: Relates to central business district tolls
Summary: Provides that no toll may be established, charged and collected on any vehicle entering the central business district in any calendar year for the first twelve times; provided, however, on and after entering the central business district for the thirteenth time, a toll shall be charged and collected on such vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to certain tolls paid by certain vehicles to the central business district
